title: Q7 - How does DPDPA ensure neutrality of Consent Managers so they do not secretly favor large corporations?
description: The Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023 (DPDPA) has built-in legal and technical safeguards to ensure that Consent Managers remain neutral, transparent, and fair in their operations. They are not allowed to discriminate between Data Fiduciaries (organizations) or Data Principals (individuals) and cannot secretly favor large corporations or business partners.
